title: WTB: Joe Agler E254 Colgan's Chip

posts.post_title: WTB: Joe Agler E254 Colgan's Chip
posts.post_content: Looking to buy a Joe Agler Colgan's Chip G to EX condition.  Thanks!

Give the Pre-WWII BST forum a try:  [url]http://www.net54baseball.com/forumdisplay.php?f=20[/url]

This forum is for tobacco cards.  Good luck in your search!  :)
